text: I'm a fan half the time I go and the other half of the time I consider never coming back.  They have reasonable seafood/<oysters> and decent <beer> selection.  The service is very hit-or-miss.  <Salmon burger> is good;  the <bluegill> is usually bad.   <Mussels> are pretty good, a different spin on the usual broth.
